_source.description: Flood level sensors in Pune city.
_source.label: Environment-UUID

dataSampleFile.name: Flood sensor sample file
dataSampleFile.description: Sample data file for Pune flood sensors

_source.name: pune-env-flood

currentLevel.description: Current flooding level indicated by the sensing station corresponding to this observation, computed using referenceLevel and measuredDistance(currentLevel = referenceLevel - measuredDistance).

measuredDistance.description: The distance measured by the sensor, from the sensor tip to the upper surface of water.

referenceLevel.description: Reference setting used to compute the currentLevel.

dataDescriptor.description: Data Descriptor for flood sensor data.
dataDescriptor.dataDescriptorLabel: Data Descriptor for flood-level sensor data in Pune city

last_stop_arrival_time.description: Specifies the arrival time at the previous stop for a specific trip on a route. Times must be eight digits in HH:MM:SS format (H:MM:SS is also accepted, if the hour begins with 0). Note : Trips that span multiple dates will have stop times greater than 24:00:00. For example, if a trip begins at 10:30:00 p.m. and ends at 2:15:00 a.m. on the following day, the stop times would be 22:30:00 and 26:15:00.

trip_delay.description: This can be positive and negative in seconds and shows how much the vehicle deviates from the planned one.

last_stop_id.description: Stop ID/Stop name of the previous bus stop corresponding to the bus in this observation.

dataDescriptor.dataDescriptorLabel: Surat ITMS realtime bus ETA tracking.

trip_direction.description: The direction in which the vehicle is travelling. ENUM[UP,DN].

route_id.description: Route ID assigned to the route on which the bus corresponding to this observation is plying on.

observationDateTime.description: The time at which the vehicle was last tracked.

vehicle_label.description: User visible label, i.e., something that must be shown to the passenger to help identify the correct vehicle.

dataDescriptor.description: Data descriptor for live bus ETA and live vehicle position of the public transit buses in Surat city.

trip_id.description: Trip ID/Trip name alloted to the bus corresponding to this observation.

license_plate.description: Vehicle registration number/license plate number of the bus corresponding to this observation.

speed.description: The Speed of the bus observaed at the last tracked coordinates.

location.description: The coordinates for the current position of the bus corresponding to this observation.

actual_trip_start_time.description: This field specifies the time at which bus service actually began for the trip corresponding to this observation.

_source.label: Surat Realtime Bus Position Info-UUID
_source.name: surat-itms-realtime-information
_source.description: Realtime information for tracking public transit buses in Surat city.

trip_direction.description: The direction in which the vehicle is travelling. ENUM[UP,DN].

trip_id.description: Trip ID/Trip name alloted to the bus corresponding to this observation.

route_id.description: Route ID assigned to the route on which the bus corresponding to this observation is plying on.

trip_delay.description: This can be positive and negative in seconds and shows how much the vehicle deviates from the planned one.

last_stop_arrival_time.description: Specifies the arrival time at the previous stop for a specific trip on a route. Times must be eight digits in HH:MM:SS format (H:MM:SS is also accepted, if the hour begins with 0). Note : Trips that span multiple dates will have stop times greater than 24:00:00. For example, if a trip begins at 10:30:00 p.m. and ends at 2:15:00 a.m. on the following day, the stop times would be 22:30:00 and 26:15:00.

vehicle_label.description: User visible label, i.e., something that must be shown to the passenger to help identify the correct vehicle.

actual_trip_start_time.description: This field specifies the time at which bus service actually began for the trip corresponding to this observation.

observationDateTime.description: The time at which the vehicle was last tracked.

speed.description: The Speed of the bus observaed at the last tracked coordinates.

license_plate.description: Vehicle registration number/license plate number of the bus corresponding to this observation.
